mapper.insert: insert into ecs_user_bonus (bonus_id, bonus_type_id, bonus_sn, user_id, used_time, order_id, emailed, supplier_id) values (#{bonusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bonusTypeId,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{bonusSn,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usedTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{emailed,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update ecs_user_bonus set bonus_type_id = #{bonusTypeId,jdbcType=TINYINT}, bonus_sn = #{bonusSn,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, used_time = #{usedTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, emailed = #{emailed,jdbcType=TINYINT}, supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where bonus_id = #{bonusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select bonus_id, bonus_type_id, bonus_sn, user_id, used_time, order_id, emailed, supplier_id from ecs_user_bonus where bonus_id = #{bonusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
